Class AxeOfGodrick

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.items.Item

game.weapon.AxeOfGodrick
All Implemented Interfaces:
Capable, Printable, Weapon, Sellable
public class AxeOfGodrick
extends WeaponItem
implements Sellable
A weapon used by skeleton It deals 115 damage with 85% hit rate Buying and selling are from the player's POV

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
    To make the weapons return all the possible actions that can be done applies open close principle Approach decription: 1) use currentLocation which is updated by tick 2) check if there is someone at the same location as the weapon 3) if there is someone, proceed 3.1) else, return nothing 4) loops through all the targets around this actor and add the attack action Assumption: needs tick to be executed at least once in order to have the available actions
    int getSellingPrice()
    Gets the selling price
    void tick​(Location currentLocation, Actor actor)
    used to update the location so that getAllowableActions can use it

    • getAllowableActions

      public java.util.List<Action> getAllowableActions()
      To make the weapons return all the possible actions that can be done applies open close principle Approach decription: 1) use currentLocation which is updated by tick 2) check if there is someone at the same location as the weapon 3) if there is someone, proceed 3.1) else, return nothing 4) loops through all the targets around this actor and add the attack action Assumption: needs tick to be executed at least once in order to have the available actions
      Overrides:
      getAllowableActions in class Item
      Returns:
      a list of actions that the wielder can do with this weapon list will be empty if no actions are possible
